sentences.en: He thought that Ernest had the likeness of the Great Stone Face.
sentences.cn: 他认为恩尼斯特很像伟大的石头脸.

sentences.en: I can see the family likeness.
sentences.cn: 我看出这一家人都长得很像。

sentences.en: I see no likeness whatever between him and his brother.
sentences.cn: 我看不出他和他兄弟有任何相似之处.

sentences.en: I think the painter has produced a very true likeness.
sentences.cn: 我认为这位画家画得非常逼真.

sentences.en: Miss Rich is good at sketching people, she's clever at getting a likeness.
sentences.cn: 里奇小姐擅长人物素描.她很聪明,画人物维妙维肖.

sentences.en: She says the artist's impression is an excellent likeness of her abductor.
sentences.cn: 她说这张模拟画像像极了绑架她的人。

sentences.en: She treasured the painted likeness of her son.
That's a good likeness of him.
sentences.cn: 那是他的一张很好的肖像.

sentences.en: The beginning of love and the beginning of life have a pleasing likeness to one another.
sentences.cn: 爱情的开始与生命的开始,颇有些动人的相似之处.

sentences.en: The likeness is indeed true, but it is a dull, dead , unfeeling, inauspicious likeness.
sentences.cn: 真的,它确实很象, 但却是一种呆滞死板, 暮气沉沉, 毫无情感的相似.

sentences.en: There might be a likeness between their features, but their eyes were totally dissimilar.
sentences.cn: 他们的相貌也许有些相似，但眼睛却完全不同。

sentences.en: There was an uncommon likeness between the two boys.
sentences.cn: 这两个男孩长得像极了.

sentences.en: These myths have a startling likeness to one another.
sentences.cn: 这些神话彼此间有惊人的相似性。

sentences.en: This must be your brother: I can see a family likeness.
sentences.cn: 这位一定是你哥哥,我看你们长得很像.

sentences.en: You can see family likeness in all of them.
sentences.cn: 你可以看到他们一家人都很相像.

trans.tran_cn: 相像，相似，外表，照片，肖像
trans.tran_en: the quality of being similar in appearance to someone or something
